main event: A round object, the size of a quarter, was observed drifting back and forth for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was probably white in color, The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes before the object drifted out of sight, It was noted that the observation was made in the vicinity of many weather stations, Regular weather balloon releases were made around the time of the sighting, Winds at the time were from 30 to 50 thousand feet to the East.
